examples: The film was so scary I was shaking in my boots.
He watched a scary movie and got scared during the suspenseful scenes.
They never watch scary movies because they find them too frightening.
The car accident was scary, but thankfully no one was seriously injured - nothing so bad but might have been worse.
Moving to a new city was scary, but it was also a chance for him to spread his wings and start a new chapter in his life.
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy sợ hãi

examples: Titus' shell is a lot more bumpy.
Sand boas have really bumpy tails.
It was bumpy.
But soon, the road turned bumpy for the Beetle in America.
Become bumpier and more rock-like.
words.defineEn: (of surfaces) going up and down in many places and so walking, riding, or driving on becomes hard
words.defineVi: (của các bề mặt) đi lên và đi xuống ở nhiều nơi và do đó việc đi lại, cưỡi ngựa hoặc lái xe trở nên khó khăn

examples: Short hair really becomes you.
The boss has a short fuse these days!
She made short work of her opponents.
We fell short of our goal in the competition.
As they say, short reckonings make long friends.
words.defineEn: having a below-average or small distance between two points
words.defineVi: có khoảng cách dưới trung bình hoặc nhỏ giữa hai điểm

examples: She wears her hair long.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Our players kept the pedal to the metal all season long.
The kids are under my feet all day long.
North Korea’s refusal had long been a sticking point.
words.defineEn: (of two points) having an above-average or big distance between them
words.defineVi: (của hai điểm) có khoảng cách trên trung bình hoặc lớn giữa chúng

examples: The hiker enjoyed the scenic beauty of the river's gentle bends.
The Rhine River is one of the longest rivers in Germany and offers scenic boat cruises.
We went on a road trip and explored the scenic beauty of the country.
Whether you take the scenic route or the highway, it makes no odds to the length of the journey.
Families in the scenic park enjoyed picnic sandwiches with thinly sliced picnic shoulder and fresh toppings.
words.defineEn: having a very beautiful view of nature
words.defineVi: có một cái nhìn rất đẹp về thiên nhiên

examples: Are you feeling comfortable?
He always wears comfortable clothes when he goes for a run.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
The room had a comfortable bed where she could rest.
The rug in front of the fireplace provides a comfortable spot to sit.
words.defineEn: physically feeling relaxed and not feeling pain, stress, fear, etc.
words.defineVi: thể chất cảm thấy thoải mái và không cảm thấy đau đớn, căng thẳng, sợ hãi, v.v.

examples: The movie was as boring as they come.
It’s so boring, eating the same food day in, day out.
I have to do the same boring jobs day in day out.
The child nodded off to sleep during the boring lecture.
This course seemed right up my alley when I signed up for it, but it ended up being dreadfully boring.
words.defineEn: making us feel tired and unsatisfied because of not being interesting
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy mệt mỏi và không hài lòng vì không thú vị

examples: The vibrant orange color of a ripe nectarine is so appealing.
so I ate my fill.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
So, did you get the promotion?
So who spilled the beans about her affair with David?
words.defineEn: to such a great extent or degree
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ lớn như vậy hoặc mức độ

examples: The cruise went very quickly.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
Her condition is very serious.
The design is very basic.
words.defineEn: to a great extent or degree
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ lớn hoặc mức độ

examples: The news really made my day.
That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!
The contractor is really taking their time.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
words.defineEn: used to put emphasis on a statement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh vào một tuyên bố

examples: My knowledge of French is pretty basic.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
Those movie stars live pretty high off the hog.
Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
words.defineEn: to a degree that is high but not very high
words.defineVi: ở mức độ cao nhưng không cao lắm

examples: The prices at the luxury boutique were quite high.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
My father is quite old now
Quite suddenly, her mind was made up.
He plays quite well.
He’s a kind of poor man’s James Bond.
well, I took a beating in prison and I kind of lost my hearing, you know.
Among all kinds of pepper, my favorite is jalapeno for its spicy and flavorful kick.
Not every girl has the stomach for that kind of thing.
For a football player, that kind of injury is par for the course.
words.defineEn: in some ways or to some degree
words.defineVi: theo một số cách hoặc ở một mức độ nào đó
